title: School start times EBQ Part C

content.question: Using the sources provided, develop and justify an argument about the best time for school to start for students in grades 6 to 12. C. (i) Support your claim using an additional piece of specific and relevant evidence from a different source than the one that was used in part B (i). (ii) Explain how the evidence from part C (i) supports your claim using a different psychological perspective, theory, concept, or research finding learned in AP Psychology than the one that was used in part B (ii).

frqParts.text: Using the sources provided, develop and justify an argument about the best time for school to start for students in grades 6 to 12. C. (i) Support your claim using an additional piece of specific and relevant evidence from a different source than the one that was used in part B (i). (ii) Explain how the evidence from part C (i) supports your claim using a different psychological perspective, theory, concept, or research finding learned in AP Psychology than the one that was used in part B (ii).
